alert.note: Alert for Box Butte; Dawes (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 10 at 6:00PM CDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Box Butte and southeastern Dawes Counties through 545 PM MDT... At 500 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Box Butte Campground, or 25 miles southwest of Chadron, moving southeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Hemingford, Box Butte Campground, Box Butte Dam and Marsland. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
